titles.title: Special Needs Tax Credit Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a credit to individuals for legal expenses paid with respect to establishing guardianship of a disabled individual.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
4/13/2015--Introduced. Special Needs Tax Credit Act
Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an income-based tax credit, up to $5,000 in a taxable year, for legal expenses paid to establish a legal guardianship of a disabled individual.
